name: TheBigIdeaCampMorningMoment
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: The Big Idea Camp partners with schools bringing quality character development curriculum from CORE ESSENTIALS (www.CoreEssentials.org), and by hosting assemblies, producing school lesson videos, and in partnership with MyTownTV with the monthly Children's Program "Out Neighborhood".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
